Text:
Could you please upload the complete scan, incl the other scenarios and the profiles with point cost?
The "Hobby" section doesn't matter, but the rest would be great.
Thanks
Thanks for the upload. It would be awesome to have the rest of the book as well!

Just wanted to say thank you again for this. Really excellent quality. 

Please, please, please can you do the rest of the book?

For those looking for the profiles.
Google "LonelyKnight army builder"
The site LK's files has a file named SBG something. Contains all the profiles.
